name: canoeist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person travelling in a canoe (= a small, light, narrow boat, pointed at both ends): A group of canoeists paddled past. The club welcomes visiting canoeists. See
canoe
More examplesFewer examplesThe 21-mile-long paddling route will have a dozen launch sites for kayakers and canoeists.Many rafters are also canoeists. Two canoeists paddled down a flooded residential street. The sandy shore is a popular landing spot for kayakers and canoeists who paddle across the bay.
